curam.util.ctm.bom

Class BOMExceptionHandlerUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.ctm.bom.BOMExceptionHandlerUtils

  • public final class BOMExceptionHandlerUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that manages the exception handling scenarios that happens during the invocation of various BusinessObjectModule related hook methods, such as upsertEntity, setPrimaryKey, from the BusinessObjectHelper class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static AppException handleIllegalAccessException(java.lang.IllegalAccessException e, java.lang.Object bomObject)
      Handles the illegal access exception scenario that happens because of the usage of Java Reflective APIs.
      static AppException handleIllegalArgumentException(java.lang.IllegalArgumentException e, java.lang.Object bomObject)
      Handles the illegal argument exception scenario that happens because of the usage of Java Reflective APIs.
      static void handleInvocationTargetException(java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException e, java.lang.Object bomObject)
      Handles the invocation target exception scenario that happens because of the usage of Java Reflective APIs.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • handleIllegalArgumentException

        public static AppException handleIllegalArgumentException(java.lang.IllegalArgumentException e,
                                                          java.lang.Object bomObject)
        Handles the illegal argument exception scenario that happens because of the usage of Java Reflective APIs. This exception is translated and re-thrown as Application Exception.
        Parameters:
        e - The illegal argument exception object.
        bomObject - The Business object module implementation object that had thrown this exception.
        Returns:
        The translated application exception object from IllegalArgumentException.

      • handleIllegalAccessException

        public static AppException handleIllegalAccessException(java.lang.IllegalAccessException e,
                                                        java.lang.Object bomObject)
        Handles the illegal access exception scenario that happens because of the usage of Java Reflective APIs. This exception is translated and re-thrown as Application Exception.
        Parameters:
        e - The illegal access exception object.
        bomObject - The Business object module implementation object that had thrown this exception.
        Returns:
        The translated application exception object from IllegalAccessException.

      • handleInvocationTargetException

        public static void handleInvocationTargetException(java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException e,
                                                   java.lang.Object bomObject)
                                            throws AppException,
                                                   InformationalException
        Handles the invocation target exception scenario that happens because of the usage of Java Reflective APIs. This exception is translated and re-thrown as Application Exception. Any exception whose cause is not an instance of AppException will be re-thrown as not handled server exception.
        Parameters:
        e - The invocation target exception object.
        bomObject - The Business object module implementation object that had thrown this exception.
        Throws:
        AppException - Generic Exception signature.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception signature.
